column4: 8.10 is working pretty nice so far. I just did the upgrade from 8.04
so is everything working fine for you, i had one bug
Yes.. I had to shutdown ath0 and restart networking everytime to get wireless to work in 8.04. Now it works like it should
But now all of my app windows dont have a minimize to tool bar button, or the square or the X to close it.. wierd
